text: avan tan atiyarkalai atakki alukiran; melum, unkalukkup patukavalarkalaiyum erpatuttukiran. (Marana neram varumvarai avarkal unkalai patukakkinranar,) pinnar, unkalil oruvarukku maranam vantal namatu (vanavat) tutarkal avarai uyir vankukinranar. Avarkal (kuritta kalattirku munnaro, pinnaro uyiraik kaipparri) etum tavarilaippatillai
